mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bannedwords (wordno, word, reason, rdate, goodcnt) VALUES (bannedwords_seq.nextval, #{word}, #{reason}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT wordno, word, reason, goodcnt, rdate FROM bannedwords ORDER BY wordno DESC
SELECT wordno, word, reason, goodcnt, rdate FROM bannedwords ORDER BY wordno DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT wordno, word, goodcnt, reason ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY wordno DESC) AS rnum FROM bannedwords WHERE (#{word} IS NULL OR #{word} = '' OR word = #{word}) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bannedwords WHERE (#{word} IS NULL OR #{word} = '' OR word = #{word})
